ygData.subject: RE: Imbrued platemail - a defect?
ygData.msgSnippet: i never even considered this.  i am absolutely ecstatic to have a full set of imbrued (minus arms, have mithril vambraces).  the strength, charisma,
ygData.messageBody:
i never even considered this. i am absolutely ecstatic to have a full set
of imbrued (minus arms, have mithril vambraces). the strength, charisma,
dexterity,a dn resistance bonuses of the major imbrued pieces far outweigh a
couple of AC points.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, L24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, L24 High Elf Wizard
Manda, L19 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

> So why
> are bards penalized I ask?
> I think there's a chance that an error was made. It seems the
> ac on each
> piece of our armor is the same of rangers/rogues who although
> are melee
> classes, they are also natural chain wearers, who were desgined by
> Verant to have *less* ac than any type of plate-wearing class, not
> *equal* ac.
